<a id="Gradient"></a>

# Gradient

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A color transition.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This resource describes a color transition by defining a set of colored points and how to interpolate between them.

See also [Curve](Curve.md) which supports more complex easing methods, but does not support colors.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **InterpolationMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode)

<a id="Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_LINEAR"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[InterpolationMode](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode) **GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_LINEAR** = `0`

Linear interpolation.<a id="Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CONSTANT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[InterpolationMode](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode) **GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CONSTANT** = `1`

Constant interpolation, color changes abruptly at each point and stays uniform between. This might cause visible aliasing when used for a gradient texture in some cases.<a id="Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CUBIC"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[InterpolationMode](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode) **GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CUBIC** = `2`

Cubic interpolation.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="enum_Gradient_ColorSpace"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ColorSpace**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_Gradient_ColorSpace)

<a id="Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_COLOR_SPACE_SRGB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorSpace](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_ColorSpace) **GRADIENT_COLOR_SPACE_SRGB** = `0`

sRGB color space.<a id="Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_COLOR_SPACE_LINEAR_SRGB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorSpace](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_ColorSpace) **GRADIENT_COLOR_SPACE_LINEAR_SRGB** = `1`

Linear sRGB color space.<a id="Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_COLOR_SPACE_OKLAB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ColorSpace](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_ColorSpace) **GRADIENT_COLOR_SPACE_OKLAB** = `2`

[Oklab](https://bottosson.github.io/posts/oklab/) color space. This color space provides a smooth and uniform-looking transition between colors.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Gradient_property_colors"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **colors** = `PackedColorArray(0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_property_colors)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_colors**\ (\ value\: [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md)\ )
- [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) **get_colors**\ (\ )

Gradient's colors as a [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md).

\ **Note:** Setting this property updates all colors at once. To update any color individually use [set_color()](Gradient.md#Gradient_method_set_color).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedColorArray](PackedColorArray.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_property_interpolation_color_space"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[ColorSpace](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_ColorSpace) **interpolation_color_space** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_property_interpolation_color_space)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_interpolation_color_space**\ (\ value\: [ColorSpace](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_ColorSpace)\ )
- [ColorSpace](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_ColorSpace) **get_interpolation_color_space**\ (\ )

The color space used to interpolate between points of the gradient. It does not affect the returned colors, which will always be in sRGB space.

\ **Note:** This setting has no effect when [interpolation_mode](Gradient.md#Gradient_property_interpolation_mode) is set to [GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CONSTANT](Gradient.md#Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CONSTANT).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_property_interpolation_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[InterpolationMode](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode) **interpolation_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_property_interpolation_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_interpolation_mode**\ (\ value\: [InterpolationMode](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode)\ )
- [InterpolationMode](Gradient.md#enum_Gradient_InterpolationMode) **get_interpolation_mode**\ (\ )

The algorithm used to interpolate between points of the gradient.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_property_offsets"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) **offsets** = `PackedFloat32Array(0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_property_offsets)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_offsets**\ (\ value\: [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md)\ )
- [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) **get_offsets**\ (\ )

Gradient's offsets as a [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md).

\ **Note:** Setting this property updates all offsets at once. To update any offset individually use [set_offset()](Gradient.md#Gradient_method_set_offset).

**Note:** The returned array is *copied* and any changes to it will not update the original property value. See [PackedFloat32Array](PackedFloat32Array.md) for more details.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Method Descriptions

<a id="Gradient_method_add_point"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **add_point**\ (\ offset\: [float](float.md), color\: [Color](Color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_add_point)

Adds the specified color to the gradient, with the specified offset.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_get_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Color](Color.md) **get_color**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_get_color)

Returns the color of the gradient color at index `point`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_get_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_offset**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_get_offset)

Returns the offset of the gradient color at index `point`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_get_point_count"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_point_count**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_get_point_count)

Returns the number of colors in the gradient.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_remove_point"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_point**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_remove_point)

Removes the color at index `point`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_reverse"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **reverse**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_reverse)

Reverses/mirrors the gradient.

\ **Note:** This method mirrors all points around the middle of the gradient, which may produce unexpected results when [interpolation_mode](Gradient.md#Gradient_property_interpolation_mode) is set to [GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CONSTANT](Gradient.md#Gradient_constant_GRADIENT_INTERPOLATE_CONSTANT).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_sample"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Color](Color.md) **sample**\ (\ offset\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_sample)

Returns the interpolated color specified by `offset`. `offset` should be between ``0.0`` and ``1.0`` (inclusive). Using a value lower than ``0.0`` will return the same color as ``0.0``, and using a value higher than ``1.0`` will return the same color as ``1.0``. If your input value is not within this range, consider using [@GlobalScope.remap()](@GlobalScope.md#@GlobalScope_method_remap) on the input value with output values set to ``0.0`` and ``1.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_set_color"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_color**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md), color\: [Color](Color.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_set_color)

Sets the color of the gradient color at index `point`.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Gradient_method_set_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_offset**\ (\ point\: [int](int.md), offset\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Gradient_method_set_offset)

Sets the offset for the gradient color at index `point`.
